prompt:
Create a responsive todo app with HTML5, CSS3 and vanilla JavaScript.
Requirements:
1) Clean UI with CSS Grid/Flexbox
2) Add/edit/delete/complete tasks
3) Categories and priority levels
4) Due dates with date-picker
5) Local storage for persistence
6) Search and filter tasks
7) Drag and drop reordering
8) Responsive design with media queries
9) Dark/light theme toggle
10) Basic animations

Build a modern weather dashboard using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and the OpenWeatherMap API.
Include:
1) Current weather with icons
2) 5-day forecast
3) Hourly breakdown
4) Search by city/coordinates
5) Geolocation support
6) Temperature unit toggle
7) Weather alerts
8) Wind/humidity/pressure stats
9) Sunrise/sunset times
10) Responsive grid layout with CSS Grid

Create a scientific calculator with HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.
Features:
1) Basic arithmetic
2) Scientific functions (sin,cos,log etc)
3) Memory operations
4) History log
5) Keyboard support
6) Error handling
7) Responsive design
8) Theme switcher
9) Sound feedback
10) Copy results

Build a markdown notes app with HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.
Include:
1) Rich text editor
2) Live markdown preview
3) Categories/tags
4) Search notes
5) Local storage sync
6) Export to PDF/MD
7) Dark mode
8) Responsive layout
9) Keyboard shortcuts
10) Auto-save

Create a pomodoro timer app using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.
Features:
1) Work/break timers
2) Custom intervals
3) Progress circle
4) Sound notifications
5) Task tracking
6) Statistics dashboard
7) Local storage
8) PWA support
9) Keyboard shortcuts
10) Multiple themes

Develop an interactive quiz app with HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.
Include:
1) Multiple choice questions
2) Timer per question
3) Score tracking
4) Progress bar
5) Review answers
6) Leaderboard
7) Different categories
8) Difficulty levels
9) Results summary
10) Share results

Build an advanced color tool with HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.
Features:
1) Color picker
2) RGB/HSL/HEX conversion
3) Color palettes
4) Save favorites
5) Color harmony
6) Gradient generator
7) Contrast checker
8) Copy values
9) Color naming
10) Export options

Create a secure password generator using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.
Include:
1) Custom length
2) Character types
3) Password strength meter
4) Copy button
5) Save passwords
6) Generate multiple
7) Password history
8) Entropy calculator
9) Memorable options
10) Export list

Build a health metrics calculator with HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.
Features:
1) BMI calculator
2) Body fat %
3) Ideal weight
4) Calorie needs
5) Health tips
6) Metric/Imperial
7) Results history
8) Progress charts
9) Print report
10) Save profile

Develop a currency converter using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and Exchange Rate API.
Include:
1) Live rates
2) Multiple currencies
3) Conversion history
4) Favorite pairs
5) Charts/graphs
6) Offline support
7) Calculator
8) Rate alerts
9) Compare rates
10) Print/export
